attributes.action: Force Airlines to bring their Ticket Prices down due to Fuel falling.
attributes.background:
Due to the fact vehicle fuel has dropped but Airlines have not and so must be making a vast profit, it is Not fare on their passengers and Holiday makers.

Airlines must pass on vast fuel price drops.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. As airlines are private companies, this is an operational decision for them and not the UK Government and Parliament.
